title: Public opinion on adoption rights for same-sex couples in the U.S. 2014
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Yes should and lowest at Response No opinion.
The highest Response Yes should has 61.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response No opinion.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 63.0 is found at Response Yes should and the minimum is found at No opinion where Response is 2.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Yes should and lowest at Response No opinion.
The highest Response Yes should has 61.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response No opinion.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 63.0 is found at Response Yes should and the minimum is found at No opinion where Response is 2.0.
Response No should not has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 61.0 between the maximum Response Yes should and minimum Response No opinion.
The Response Yes should has 1.89 times more Share of respondents than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 100.0.
